Tunable.name: FAMILIAR_RABBIT_HOLE
Tunable.description: A special rabbit hole that is used by familiars when their master is also put into a rabbit hole.

Tunable.name: GENERIC_GO_HOME_AND_ATTEND
Tunable.description: An interaction that will be used to travel sims who need to rabbit hole at their home zone.

Tunable.name: LEAVE_EARLY_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: The interaction that causes a sim to leave their rabbit hole early
